title: MagSpoof
detail: Spoof credit cards from your Pebble smartwatch!
extended_details: MagSpoof is a device that allows you to spoof credit card swipes from your smartwatch. It connects underneath your smartwatch and uses a magnetic coil to spoof swipes. You can select what card to pay with from your watch!
